text: Presidio Modelo (Spanish for "model prison") is an abandoned prison in Cuba. It's an example of the round, wide design of jails and was built in 1927 on the orders of president turned dictator Geraldo Machado. Fidel Castro was one famous inmate. It is in the suburban quarter of Chac√≥n, Nueva Gerona. Category:Prisons Category:Museums in North America Category:Buildings and structures in Cuba
title: Presidio Modelo
